Articles.Content: What it says on the tin. Come on, add sonic boom effects when a ship breaks the sound barrier ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
what do you mean effects? like sound, a loud bang of some sort?

In theory I'd like this. It would need to be really nicely implemented though, it could end up being a rather buggy sound effect. ie what happens if you're flying just around the threshold for it, that may result in the sound constantly being played which would be rather unpleasant.

> 
> what do you mean effects? like sound, a loud bang of some sort?

> 
> In theory I'd like this. It would need to be really nicely implemented though, it could end up being a rather buggy sound effect. ie what happens if you're flying just around the threshold for it, that may result in the sound constantly being played which would be rather unpleasant.

I've actually had a plane stuck in the moment of going transonic ( under FAR, because it had just enough thrust set to get to that point ) - it was flying around with a visible shock cone for over an hour, I hate to think what canned booms would have done at that point ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
